segments.text: I'm hungry , let's order up something to eat .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , maybe we can order a soup and a salad from the restaurant down the street .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was thinking of getting a hamburger , fries and a chocolate sundae .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You eat too much junk food . That sort of stuff clogs up your arteries and is very high in cholesterol .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well I never seem to gain weight so I don't mind .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's not only about getting fat or not , it's about being healthy . You could really have some health problems later on .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How about pizza or maybe some fried chicken ! Better yet , let's order some hot dogs !
segments.speaker: S1
